checkAccess.title: Hipay Configuration
checkAccess.failure: There's an issue in your configuration.

config.info: In order to inform you of events related to your payment system, such as a new transaction or a 3-D Secure transaction, the HiPay Enterprise platform can send your application a server-to-server notification. Log in to the Hipay Back Office, go to the Integration > Security Setting module to retrieve the passphrase of your HiPay merchant account
